subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kemba Walker made a 21-foot shot with five seconds left in overtime to lift Charlotte over Milwaukee, providing a winning conclusion for fans celebrating the return of the Hornets’ name after a 12-year absence.
snippet: Kemba Walker made a 21-foot shot with five seconds left in overtime to lift Charlotte over Milwaukee, providing a winning conclusion for fans celebrating the return of the Hornets’ name after a 12-year absence.
